p: The global interest in scientific research is to find out new substances from natural and non-synthetic sources, thus providing them for pharmaceutical manufacturing and food preservation without any harmful effects on human health. Therefore, in this research, we employed the obtained extract by using distilled water, which was an innocuous natural solvent supplied for the food industry. The findings of the current study regarding the antimicrobial, antioxidant and anti-acetylcholinesterase activities of the LEP extract, such as an, are promising for the pharmaceutical and/or food industry. In addition, the waste products of pomegranates could be suitable to be utilized as natural preservatives in the food industry because of their antimicrobial and antioxidant properties.
